snippet.title: Jackbox: Naughty Pack - Official Reveal Teaser Trailer | ID@Xbox April 2024
snippet.description:
Watch the reveal teaser trailer for Jackbox: Naughty Pack, an intimate pack of three games for adults coming to the Jackbox party game on Xbox One and Xbox Series X/S later in 2024. It will also be available on Steam, PlayStation, Nintendo Switch, Apple TV, iPad, Epic Games, and Amazon Luna.

Jackbox Naughty Pack is an intimate pack of three games that are sure to have you laughing and maybe even sweating just a little. Stay tuned for more information as the individual games within this first mature-rated pack for Jackbox will be revealed later in summer 2024.
